titles: A general draught and prospect of government in Europe, and civil policy Shewing the antiquity, power, decay, of Parliaments. With other historical and political observations relating thereunto. In a letter.
author: Rymer, Thomas, 1641-1713.
publisher: printed for Tho. Benskin, in Greens-Rents near Fleetbridge,
notes: Running title reads: A general draught or prospect of government in Europe, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Representative government and representation --  Early works to 1800.
